message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a fantastic deal for $150.
That's a bit too high for me. I'm interested, but I can only go up to $110 right now.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $130.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $130 is still a bit high. I'm willing to go up to $115.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can offer it to you for $125.
I'm getting closer to my budget, but $125 is still a bit much. I'm willing to go up to $120. If you can't do that, I might need to go with another offer.
